issues.title: Feature Request: Add a sleep mode that tells bedtime stories
issues.body: A sleep mode that narrates bedtime stories to help users relax after long coding sessions would be a charming addition.

issues.title: Bug: Turboencabulator randomly orders pizza instead of running tasks
issues.body: Instead of executing tasks, the device sometimes orders pizza online. This is both funny and problematic.

issues.title: Support: Device makes weird noises when processing large files
issues.body: The turboencabulator emits strange mechanical noises when handling large datasets. Is this normal?

issues.title: Feature Request: Add a feature to translate data into pirate speak
issues.body: It would be hilarious if the turboencabulator could translate all data output into pirate speak for fun presentations.

issues.title: Bug: Turboencabulator's screen displays only emojis
issues.body: The display is stuck showing only emojis, making it hard to read error messages or data.
